subject: p10449297
raw_hist: Elevated white blood count. Patient with AMS, assess for CHF exacerbation.
raw_find: Comparison is made with prior study of. Moderate cardiomegaly is stable. Pulmonary edema has markedly improved. Retrocardiac opacities have improved. This could be due to atelectasis, but superimposed infection cannot be excluded. Elevation of the right hemidiaphragm is unchanged. There is no pneumothorax or enlarging pleural effusion.
